snippet: “Norman Bel Geddes Designs America” is a profusely illustrated career monograph that serves as the catalog for an exhibition.
abstract: Steven Heller reviews books Norman Bel Geddes Designs America, edited by Donald Albrecht, The Book of Books, edited by Mathieu Lommen, Numbers in Graphic Design by Roger Fawcett-Tang, The Lonely Planet Book of Everything: A Visual Guide to Travel and the World by Nigel Holmes, 100 Diagrams That Changed the World: From Earliest Cave Paintings to the Innovation of the iPod by Scott Christianson, and Silhouettes From Popular Culture by Olly Moss.
lead_paragraph: “Norman Bel Geddes Designs America” is a profusely illustrated career monograph that serves as the catalog for an exhibition.

headline.seo: ‘Norman Bel Geddes Designs America,’ and More
